actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to prohibit secondary picketing.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the National Labor Relations Act, picketing at a secondary site not controlled by the employer with which the primary labor dispute exists and aimed at encouraging consumers to refuse to purchase products of the primary employers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to prohibit secondary picketing.
